title: Derma E Microdermabrasion Scrub
text:
100% Vegan

Cruelty-free

Recyclable & wind energy certified

Formulated without GMOs, gluten, or soy

Derma E'S Microdermabrasion Scrub is a luxurious skin care treatment that used to be confined to dermatologist offices and high-end spas. It brings this luxury home and has become a customer favorite thanks to its amazing ability to transform the skin, producing superior results. This wonderful exfoliating scrub combines dead sea salt and a fine-textured crystal blend that buffs away dullness and smooths the look of fine lines, wrinkles, roughness and acne scars. The end result is a healthier, more youthful radiance.Benefits:
description: Derma E's award-winning Microdermabrasion Scrub buffs skin, helping to diminish the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and acne scars.
